member.name: M:DevTrends.MvcDonutCaching.HtmlHelperExtensions.Action(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invokes the specified child action method and returns the result as an HTML string.
member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The name of the action method to invoke.
A flag that determines whether the action should be excluded from any parent cache.
member.returns: The child action result as an HTML string.

member.name: M:DevTrends.MvcDonutCaching.HtmlHelperExtensions.Action(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invokes the specified child action method using the specified parameters and returns the result as an HTML string.
member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The name of the action method to invoke.

An object that contains the parameters for a route. You can use routeValues to provide the parameters that are bound to the action method parameters. The routeValues parameter is merged with the original route values and overrides them.
A flag that determines whether the action should be excluded from any parent cache.
member.returns: The child action result as an HTML string.

member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The name of the action method to invoke.

A dictionary that contains the parameters for a route. You can use routeValues to provide the parameters that are bound to the action method parameters. The routeValues parameter is merged with the original route values and overrides them.
A flag that determines whether the action should be excluded from any parent cache.
member.returns: The child action result as an HTML string.

member.summary: No matter what, never use the query string parameters to generate the cache key name

member.name: F:DevTrends.MvcDonutCaching.OutputCacheOptions.NoCacheLookupForPosts
member.summary: If the request is a POST, don't lookup for a cached result, execute the the result normally, caching it for subsequent GET (or any other non POST verb).

member.name: F:DevTrends.MvcDonutCaching.OutputCacheOptions.ReplaceDonutsInChildActions
member.summary: Replace donuts in child actions, may affect performance but needed if you intent to have nested donut holes in child actions
